definition: pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他们把每个海龟放进有磁线圈围绕的小池子里。

sentences.english: These levers were used to open the barrier inside the pond.
sentences.chinese: 这些操纵杆用来开放池子内部的遮挡板。

sentences.english: The ball is sealed with a zipper and floats in a pool or a lake.
sentences.chinese: 这个球用一个拉链封口，漂浮在池子或湖里。

sentences.english: I got these Photos of loutas in Maya Roster VIllage.
sentences.chinese: 这是我在马雅渡假村里的池子拍的莲花。

sentences.english: My husband filled up the pool with warm water before heading out.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫在出门的时候把池子放满了温水。

sentences.english: One kind of regulation stops me from swimming in a pond in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 一种管制阻止我在马萨诸塞州的小池子里游泳。

sentences.english: Eventually, she and her sister came out and gathered around the pool.
sentences.chinese: 最后，比和她妹妹终于从房间里出来围在池子旁边。

sentences.english: I reached for him while still on my knees and then turned to rest my back against the side of the tub.
sentences.chinese: 我中跪着伸手去抓它，然后躺在池子的边沿上休息。

sentences.english: Until you guys broke into the pool.
sentences.chinese: 直到你们突然跳进池子里。

sentences.english: Far and near the shrimp ponds are what matter to the child a little bit sub-Chunzi discuss.
sentences.chinese: 远远近近的虾池子有点啥事都来和春子商量。

sentences.english: And there's a lot of people.
sentences.chinese: 而且往往都是一池子的人。

sentences.english: They stripped off and jumped into the pool.
sentences.chinese: 他们脱掉衣服，跳进了池子。

sentences.english: When you finish swimming, you should shower well to wash of the chemicals that are in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 游完泳后应该好好冲一个澡，洗掉池子里的化学物质。

sentences.english: A tangle of white pond lilies sits in the front of a canoe in a Maine pond.
sentences.chinese: 纠缠的白色池子金针坐在前面的独木舟在缅因州池塘。

sentences.english: He built 17-long pool at the back garden to try to be in the swim.
sentences.chinese: 他在后花园建了一个17米深的池子用来游泳用。

definition: mouth of a spring or fountain
Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
